sentences.en: Buying the motorcycle of this Brand is the choice of a connoisseur.
sentences.cn: 购买这种牌子的摩托车,行家的选择.

sentences.en: He is a connoisseur in painting.
He is a connoisseur of antique furniture.
He is really a connoisseur in the antiques circle.
sentences.cn: 他在古董界算得上是一位品玩专家了.

sentences.en: His bluff exterior belied a connoisseur of antiques.
sentences.cn: 他作风粗放,令人看不出他是古董鉴赏家.

sentences.en: I thought you were a connoisseur, not a picture - dealer.
sentences.cn: 我认为你是鉴赏家, 不是画商.

sentences.en: I'm no connoisseur but I know a good champagne when I taste one.
sentences.cn: 我不是行家,但我一尝就知道是不是好香槟.

sentences.en: Only the real connoisseur could tell the difference between these two wines.
sentences.cn: 只有真正的内行才能指出这两种酒的区别.

sentences.en: Sarah tells me you're something of an art connoisseur.
sentences.cn: 萨拉告诉我你是一位艺术鉴赏家。

sentences.en: She knew Felix fancied himself as a connoisseur.
sentences.cn: 她知道费利克斯把他自己当成鉴赏家。

sentences.en: The choice of the company of town, connoisseur!
sentences.cn: 家乡的公司 、 行家的选择!

sentences.en: The connoisseur valued the ancient vase at least 5,000,000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 那鉴赏家认为这个古花瓶至少值500万元.

sentences.en: The female CEO ( Chief Executive Officer ) is a connoisseur of installation art.
sentences.cn: 那位女总裁 ( 席执行长 ) 个装置艺术的行家.

sentences.en: We are looking for a connoisseur of French champagne.
sentences.cn: 我们想找一位法国香槟酒品酒专家.

trans.tran_cn: 鉴赏家，鉴定家，行家，内行，权威
trans.tran_en: someone who knows a lot about something such as art, food, or music
